name: SpaceSHMUP
description:
Title: Space SHMUP

Platform: PC Game

Genre: Action/ Arcade

Unofficial Rating: E

Target Market: Ages 6+, casual gamers

Game Overview:

Part 1 of tutorial. Demo for moving, shooting, enemy spawn, and hero shield mechanics.

Instructions:

WASD or arrow keys to move 

Space bar to shoot

Click the blue button under the bottom right corner of the game for the best experience

Escape key to leave full screen

Game Design Team

Nathan Nguyen – Game Designer and Programmer
